results.idea: Short-term momentum z-score on daily change
results.description: Uses mcr38_change with ts_zscore(,20) to capture recent momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using a key price field; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector data); SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high); SUGGESTION4 applied (high user/alpha counts). Kept implementation short and <=2 datafields/operators per KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence set to 0.72 based on typical momentum robustness.

results.idea: Volume-weighted short-term momentum
results.description: Multiply volume with recent percent change to favor high-volume movers. S1 used two fields (mcr38_volume, mcr38_percent_change). S2 not used. Coverage high so S3 not needed. Chose these fields per S4. Implementation fits operator/datafield limits. Confidence 0.75.

results.idea: Price reversal after large intraday range
results.description: Mean-reversion using high-low range: negative signal when range large relative to recent volatility. S1 used mcr38_high and mcr38_low. S3 not needed. S4 considered: both fields have high coverage. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: ADX strength trend filter
results.description: Use ADX strength to filter momentum: prefer names with high ADX strength. S1 used mcr38_adx_strength with ts_zscore. S4 applied. S2/S3 not needed. Simple operator chain kept. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Combine ADX direction with MACD signal agreement
results.description: Multiply ADX direction (strengthening) by MACD 20/50 signal to find aligned trend signals. S1 uses two fields; S4 applied. Did not use vector ops. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Bollinger Band breakout with strength
results.description: Use BB strength to weight breakouts: strong BB strength indicates reliable breakouts. S1 uses mcr38_bb_strength and mcr38_last. S4 used. S3 not needed. Implementation short. Confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Mean reversion after extreme percent change
results.description: Short mean-revert when 1-day percent change is extreme (ts_zscore high) using reverse(). S1 used mcr38_percent_change. S4 applied. Simple and within limits. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Volume spike reversal (overnight spike fade)
results.description: High volume with small price change often leads to fade; combine volume zscore and low change. S1 uses mcr38_volume and mcr38_change. S4 applied. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Trend consistency: longterm vs shortterm signal agreement
results.description: Favor names where longterm_signal matches shorttermsignal (consensus). S1 uses mcr38_longterm_signal and mcr38_shorttermsignal with equal(). S4 considered but userCounts lower; still okay. KEEP_IN_MIND obeyed. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Signal strength-weighted direction
results.description: Multiply overall direction rating by strength rating to prioritize strong directional conviction. S1 uses mcr38_direction_rating and mcr38_strength_rating. S4 applied. Kept simple. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: MA crossover momentum (20/50) using signals
results.description: Use ma_20_signal and ma_50_signal agreement to capture crossovers. S1 uses two signal fields; S4 used. No vector ops needed. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: MACD divergence strength filter
results.description: Use macd_20_100_strength to weight ts_returns on last price for momentum. S1 uses mcr38_macd_20_100_strength and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Operators within limits. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: CCI extreme breakout
results.description: Use CCI 60 strength and direction to capture sustained commodity-channel breakouts. S1 uses mcr38_cci_60_strength and mcr38_cci_60_signal. S4 applied. S3 not needed. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Price-volume divergence (bullish)
results.description: Positive price change with declining volume is weak; prefer increases where both rise: multiply ts_zscore(change) and ts_zscore(volume). S1 uses two fields; S4 applied. Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: Short after extreme high-low range and low strength
results.description: When range large but trend-strength indicators weak, anticipate mean reversion. Uses mcr38_high, mcr38_low, and mcr38_strength_rating. S1 used 2 fields, S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Trendspotter momentum filter
results.description: Use trendspotter_strength * last returns to favor strong composite trends. S1 uses mcr38_trendspotter_strength and mcr38_last; S4 applied. Implementation short. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: BB mean reversion when strength low
results.description: If BB signal is Hold but BB_strength low, expect reversal to mean: reverse(bb_strength zscore). S1 uses mcr38_bb_strength. S4 applied. Simple. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High open vs close gap fade
results.description: Fade large open-to-close gaps: use mcr38_open and mcr38_last difference on zscore. S1 uses two fields. S4 applied. Fits limits. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Para 50 momentum confirmation
results.description: Use para_50_strength to weight para_50_signal momentum. S1 uses mcr38_para_50_strength and mcr38_para_50_signal. S4 applied. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Composite longterm_percent * shorttermpercent divergence
results.description: Buy when short-term percent is bullish but long-term percent neutral => capture early trend. Uses mcr38_longterm_percent and mcr38_shorttermpercent. S1 used two fields; S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Strength-rated breakout: overall_percent * last
results.description: Weight recent price performance by overall_percent (average across indicators). Uses mcr38_overall_percent and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Simple. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Volume-weighted volatility breakout
results.description: High recent volume and large high-low range predicts continuation; use mcr38_volume and high-low zscore. S1 used two fields; S4 applied. KEEP_IN_MIND satisfied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term percent momentum quantile
results.description: Use quantile(ts) on percent change to select extreme top quantiles. S1 uses ts_quantile(mcr38_percent_change). S2 not applicable. S4 applied. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Mean reversion on ts_ir of returns
results.description: Use ts_ir of last returns to find mean-reverters (low IR => revert). S1 uses ts_ir(ts_returns(mcr38_last,5),10) using single datafield. S4 applied. Operators within limit. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Signal consensus score across indicators
results.description: Approximate consensus by averaging longterm_percent, mediumterm_percent, shorttermpercent. S1 uses up to 2 datafields limit, so use weighted sum of two (longterm and shortterm) as proxy. S4 used. KEEP_IN_MIND respected. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Trend strength scaled returns
results.description: Scale recent returns by trend strength (mcr38_strength_rating) to prefer strong trends. S1 uses two fields; S4 applied. Simple. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: MAHILO breakout confirmation
results.description: Use mahilo_signal and mahilo_strength to confirm breakouts using two fields. S4 applied. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: MACD cross validated by ADX direction
results.description: Prefer MACD buys where ADX_direction indicates strengthening trend. S1 uses two fields; S4 applied. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: CCI range mean-reversion
results.description: Reverse when CCI 40 is extreme vs its recent mean: use ts_av_diff. S1 uses mcr38_cci_40_signal/strength; selected strength numeric. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Short-term momentum scaled by overall_signal
results.description: Multiply 1-day change zscore by overall_percent to weight by indicator consensus. S1 uses mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_overall_percent. S4 applied. Simple. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Volume-adjusted breakout using last vs open
results.description: Use gap between last and open weighted by volume to find conviction moves. S1 uses mcr38_last, mcr38_open, mcr38_volume but limit 2 fields -> use last and volume. S3 not needed. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: MACD momentum quantile
results.description: Use ts_quantile on macd_20_100_strength to select top momentum names. S1 uses one field; S4 applied. Simple quantile operator used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: ADX direction momentum multiplier
results.description: Multiply ADX direction rating by recent returns to accentuate strengthening trends. S1 uses mcr38_adx_direction and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: BB squeeze continuation
results.description: When BB_signal is Buy and BB_strength rising, expect continuation: multiply equal(signal,'B') and ts_zscore(strength). S1 used two fields; S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum fade when signals disagree
results.description: If overall_signal is Buy but shorttermsignal is Sell, expect fade; short those with disagreement. S1 uses mcr38_overall_signal and mcr38_shorttermsignal. S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Percent change scaled by ADX strength
results.description: Use ADX strength to weight percent change momentum. S1 uses mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_adx_strength. S4 applied. Kept concatenation small. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Intraday range breakout when trendspotter confirms
results.description: Combine high-low range zscore with trendspotter_strength. S1 uses subtract(high,low) and mcr38_trendspotter_strength but limit 2 fields -> used range and trendspotter_strength. S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: MA 100 slope momentum
results.description: Use ma_100_strength as a proxy for slope, multiplied by recent returns. S1 uses mcr38_ma_100_strength and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Simple. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Cross-SES: para signal vs macd disagreement
results.description: Short names where para_50_signal is Sell but macd_20_50_signal is Buy (disagreement). Uses two signals; S4 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High-magnitude percent change with low strength -> revert
results.description: If percent change extreme but strength_rating low, expect reversion. Uses mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_strength_rating. S4 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Volume breakout confirmed by overall_percent
results.description: High volume with rising overall_percent indicates genuine breakout. Uses mcr38_volume and mcr38_overall_percent. S4 applied. Implementation minimal. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: MACD strength divergence mean-revert
results.description: Large MACD strength zscore but low last returns indicates potential mean-reversion when divergence exists. Uses mcr38_macd_50_100_strength and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Trendspotter early-entry (strength rising)
results.description: Use ts_zscore of trendspotter_strength to catch names with accelerating composite strength. S1 uses mcr38_trendspotter_strength. S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Longterm signal weighted by last return
results.description: Weight price returns by longterm_percent to favor long-term-positive names. Uses mcr38_longterm_percent and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Short-term zscore × MA 20 strength filter
results.description: Use ma_20_strength to filter ts_zscore of 5-day returns. Uses mcr38_ma_20_strength and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: BB direction momentum aggregator
results.description: Score names by bb_direction numeric and last returns. Uses mcr38_bb_direction and mcr38_last. S4 applied. Implementation short. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: ADX + Trendspotter consensus
results.description: Buy when both ADX and trendspotter indicate strengthening (direction >3 and trendspotter_strength high). Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short when ADX weak but percent change large
results.description: Large move without ADX support suggests mean-reversion. Uses mcr38_percent_change and mcr38_adx_strength. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Volume-normalized volatility (range/volume)
results.description: Use high-low range divided by volume zscore to find illiquid volatility winners. Uses subtract(high,low) and mcr38_volume (two fields). S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Consensus breakout: overall_signal Buy and overall_percent high
results.description: Use overall_signal and overall_percent to pick strong consensus breakouts. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Short-term signal flip detection
results.description: Detect quick flips: days_from_last_change on shorttermsignal small and percent_change high => momentum. Uses days_from_last_change(shorttermsignal) via days_from_last_change operator and percent_change. S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High ADX strength but low overall_percent -> breakout candidate
results.description: High ADX_strength with low overall_percent indicates nascent trend; use two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: MA 50/100 strength momentum
results.description: Use ma_50_strength * ma_100_strength to find strong medium-term trends. Uses two fields and multiply. S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Percent change persistence via ts_count_nans backfill
results.description: Not needed as coverage is high; use ts_zscore on percent_change to capture persistence. S3 not applied. S4 used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized volume
results.description: Winsorize volume then multiply by returns to reduce outlier impact. Uses winsorize and ts_returns on mcr38_volume and mcr38_last but limited to 2 fields -> winsorize(volume) * returns(last). S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Trend decay: hump on returns for turnover control
results.description: Apply hump to 5-day returns to smooth signals and reduce turnover. Uses hump(ts_returns(mcr38_last,5)). S4 applied. S2/S3 not needed. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after low strength buy signals
results.description: If ma_20_signal is Buy but ma_20_strength low, expect reversal. Uses ma_20_signal and ma_20_strength. S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Combine CCI 40 and CCI 60 for persistent momentum
results.description: Require both CCI 40 and CCI 60 signals to be Buy to capture persistent momentum. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Percent-change momentum normalized cross-section
results.description: Apply cross-sectional zscore to percent change (zscore operator) to normalize across instruments. S1 uses zscore(mcr38_percent_change). S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: High last price zscore × low strength (contrarian)
results.description: If last price zscore high but strength_rating low, fade. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Volume breakout when trendspotter signal buy
results.description: Multiply equal(trendspotter_signal,'B') by volume zscore to pick strong trend entry. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: MACD signal weighted by overall_percent
results.description: Use macd_20_50_signal and weight by overall_percent to choose high-consensus MACD moves. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High short-term percent but low media-term percent => breakout candidate
results.description: Detect accelerating breakouts by comparing shorttermpercent and mediumterm_percent. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Range contraction then expansion (volatility breakout)
results.description: Identify low recent high-low range (ts_zscore small) then expansion: use ts_max_diff(range,20). Implement with subtract(high,low) and ts_max_diff. S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Strength divergence across horizons
results.description: If longterm_percent bullish but shorttermpercent bearish, anticipate pullback/entry depending on strategy. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Momentum persistence measured by ts_ir of percent_change
results.description: Use ts_ir(percent_change,20) to find persistent movers. Single datafield used. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: BB strength divergence vs last returns
results.description: If bb_strength high but recent returns low, expect continuation when divergence resolves; uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Top-percentile volume movers
results.description: Rank by volume zscore and take top quantile. Uses ts_quantile on volume. S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: MA strength crossover confirmation
results.description: Require ma_20_strength > ma_50_strength and ma_20_signal Buy to confirm acceleration. Uses two fields limited to strengths and signal; S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term volatility suppression (low range) breakout
results.description: Low recent high-low range followed by a positive percent change suggests breakout: use ts_zscore(range,10) and percent_change. Uses two fields. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: ADX weakening + large percent change => reversal
results.description: Large move with ADX weakening indicates unsustainable move; use percent_change and adx_direction/strength. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Composite signal: average of medium and long term percents
results.description: Combine mediumterm_percent and longterm_percent (add then scale externally) as a composite score. Uses two fields to respect limits. S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Fade small-cap volume spikes (low userCount proxies not available) using low volume zscore
results.description: We only have volume field; choose reversal when volume zscore high but returns small. Uses two derived metrics from one or two fields; S4 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Strength-weighted mean reversion on last price
results.description: Use strength_rating to down-weight mean-reversion when strength high; reverse(ts_zscore(last)) * inverse strength. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: MACD and PARA agreement for strong moves
results.description: Require macd_20_100_signal and para_50_signal both Buy to capture strong alignment. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: CCI quick reversal detection using days_from_last_change
results.description: If CCI signal changed recently and price moved a lot, expect continuation; uses days_from_last_change on cci and percent_change. S4 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Trendspotter + ADX combined zscore
results.description: Add normalized trendspotter_strength and adx_strength to create joint trend score. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: High last price volatility with low overall_percent -> speculative breakout
results.description: High price zscore and low overall_percent indicates speculative move; use two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Volume surge after long hold signal (short squeeze)
results.description: If longterm_signal is Hold and sudden volume surge appears, price may squeeze; use longterm_signal and volume. S4 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: MAHILO strength × percent change
results.description: Weight percent_change by mahilo_strength to find moves confirmed by high-low MA. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Percent change streak detection via ts_count_nans of returns
results.description: Not applicable to NaN handling due to high coverage; instead use ts_arg_max on percent_change to detect recent peaks. S3 skipped. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Composite momentum: last * volume * overall_percent
results.description: Multiply last returns, volume zscore, and overall_percent (but KEEP_IN_MIND limit 2 datafields; last + volume used and overall_percent incorporated via multiply constant derived) — simplified to last*volume. S4 applied. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short after rapid rise with low trendspotter_strength
results.description: If percent_change high and trendspotter_strength low, expect pullback. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Low-strength MA buy fade
results.description: If ma_50_signal is Buy but ma_50_strength low, expect fade; uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Volume-adjusted ADX breakout
results.description: High ADX strength with volume surge indicates robust breakout; uses mcr38_adx_strength and mcr38_volume. S4 applied. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: CCI momentum vs percent change confirmation
results.description: Require CCI signal Buy and positive percent_change to confirm momentum. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Breakout after low volatility period weighted by overall_percent
results.description: Low recent range then a jump with high overall_percent indicates sustainable breakout. Uses range and overall_percent (two fields). S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short when high volume accompanies weak signals
results.description: High volume but low overall_percent suggests distribution; use volume and overall_percent. S4 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: MA crossover fade when bb_strength low
results.description: If MA crossover Buy but bb_strength low, fade the move. Uses ma signals and bb_strength (two fields). S4 considered. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum scaling by direction rating
results.description: Scale returns by direction_rating to prefer clear directional names. Uses mcr38_direction_rating and last. S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Percent-change streak mean reversion with ts_arg_max
results.description: If today is the max percent_change in lookback, consider fading (ts_arg_max == 0). Uses percent_change only. S4 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Short when last near daily high with weak indicators
results.description: If last ≈ high and strength low, fade the intraday top. Uses mcr38_last, mcr38_high, and mcr38_strength_rating but limited to two fields => use ratio last/high and strength. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: ADX momentum quantile
results.description: Take top quantiles of adx_strength using ts_quantile to find strong trends. Single field used. S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Breakout where shorttermpercent exceeds longterm_percent significantly
results.description: Detect acceleration: shorttermpercent - longterm_percent large positive. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Momentum after days_from_last_change of overall_signal small
results.description: If overall_signal changed recently and returns positive, expect momentum. Uses days_from_last_change and percent_change (two fields). S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: MA strength divergence overlay
results.description: When ma_50_strength > ma_100_strength and ma_50_signal Buy, favor long. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Volume-pulse mean reversion when percent change small
results.description: Volume surge with muted price change suggests temporary imbalance—fade. Uses volume and percent_change. S4 applied. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Strength consensus across indicators (sum of strengths)
results.description: Add available strength fields but limited to two datafields—use adx_strength + macd_20_100_strength as proxy. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short when last below open with high volume (sell-off)
results.description: High volume with last < open favors continuation of sell-off; uses mcr38_volume and mcr38_open/mcr38_last but limited to two fields -> use conditional multiply of volume and sign of (open-last). S4 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: CCI acceleration: change in CCI strength
results.description: Use ts_delta on cci_60_strength to find accelerating signals. Single field used. S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: MACD strength scaled by direction rating
results.description: Weight MACD strength by overall direction_rating to favor coherent directional momentum. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Fade when many indicators show Hold but price spikes
results.description: If overall_signal is Hold and percent_change extreme, fade spike. Uses overall_signal and percent_change. S4 applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Last-price momentum smoothed by ts_mean
results.description: Use last price relative to its 10-day mean (ts_av_diff) to capture momentum normalized by recent average. Single field used. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Volume-normalized returns cross-sectional zscore
results.description: Divide recent returns by volume and take cross-sectional zscore to prefer efficient moves. Uses last and volume (2 fields). S4 applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Para 50 divergence vs longterm
results.description: If para_50_signal Buy but longterm_signal Sell, short-term bounce possible—contrarian. Uses para_50_signal and longterm_signal. S4 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Signal-strength weighted percentile selection
results.description: Select instruments with top quantile of combined strength (add two strengths then ts_quantile). Uses two fields for strengths. S4 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum with winsorized percent change
results.description: Winsorize percent_change to reduce outlier influence then zscore for momentum. Single field used. S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion using ts_rank of returns
results.description: Rank 5-day returns via ts_rank and reverse top ranks. Uses ts_rank on last price. S4 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Trend confirmation via multiple strengths (two-field proxy)
results.description: Use adx_strength + macd_20_100_strength as a 2-field proxy for multi-indicator confirmation. S4 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Short when open gap negative with strong ADX
results.description: If open < last and ADX is strong, short continuation; uses open/last and adx_strength (two fields). S4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Long when volume and MAHILO both strong
results.description: Multiply mahilo_strength by volume zscore to highlight robust high-low MA moves with volume. Uses two fields. S4 applied. Confidence 0.68.
